Hi everybody

I have downloaded the cantera's latest version (1.7) in order=
 to
install it under UNIX.
I want to use the python interface.

The compila=
tion and installation occur without problems. To test my
installation, I've=
 done a little script which just import Cantera :

from cantera import *

W=
hen I execute it, I've the following error :

"error in __init__.py : No mo=
dule named cantera".

I've checked and compare the build repertory of Cante=
ra 1.6 and 1.7.

The only difference I see between 1.6 and 1.7 is the direc=
tory:

/PATHTOCANTERA/Cantera/python/build/lib.linux-i686-2.2/Cantera
In ve=
rsion 1.7 there is not the library _cantera.so
So this file, isn't installe=
d in my python package
(python/Sites-Packages/Cantera) and if i copy the _c=
antera.so 's 1.6
version in the 1.7 folder, my script (from cantera import =
*) works fine.

So where is my compilation error?
